name: Wizards Tower
description:
Controls WASD- Walk Around

 E- Interact 

Evil Wizard Thulsa Boom has trapped you inside his mage tower. You need to escape but if you make a mistake you’ll remain trapped forever.

A little attempt at a jam from the art side of the egg.  We will be polishing this up since we may have messed up a little of the blueprinting to open the door to the third room so hopefully you will check back in a day or two.
